title: Federal system divides power central vs regional

content.question: In a federal system of government, political power is primarily

choices.label: divided between the central government and regional governments
divided between regional governments and local governments

content.answer: divided between the central government and regional governments

topic.text: 1.7: Relationship Between the States and National Government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
